resources.string: 1. go to https://developers.facebook.com 2. MyApp -> Add New App -> Display Name, Contact Email ->click Create App Id -> Im not robot submit 3. copy APP ID to strings.xml. 4. Settings -> Basic ->Add Platform -> Android -> give Google Play Package, Class Name, Key Hashes then save changes -> Use this package name. 5. Package Name: com.support.fb, Class Name: com.support.fb.MainActivity, 6. For KeyHashes: Gradles -> Tasks -> Android -> signingReport, in run section copy SH1 key 7. Docs -> Android SDK -> login
